message:
I work on projects with some friends and we usually use facebook and skype to communicate but as u know facebook become a waste of time.

Which tools do you recommend for communication between team members ? 

After some search , I found flowdock and Hipchat

data.message: HipChat is awesome. Biggest bonus is ability to mention someone who's not here and then have them receive the message via email
Hipchat is awesome https://slack.com/ is awesome too
Check assembla, bitbycket private repos, Visual Studio Online (with TFS for tracking work). Most often that's all you need besides email+ any form of chat
Most often for tracking just Trello is good enough, but as mentioned you can get TFS tracking (best part of TFS) from VS Online. I noticed Assemblage free plan is not super compelling anymore.
I know Trello , it is nice :D but as u said assembla is very limited , I guess I'm going to use slack because of its ability to integrate with many other tools.

If you want to have a voice chat meeting I recommend "Mumble", It takes some time to set it up first time but is very easy to use afterwards just pick a free server. The voice chat is encrypted. If you want to discover other secure apps take a look at https://prism-break.org
